verses.name: Matthew 23:1
verses.text: Then spake Jesus to the multitude, and to his disciples,

verses.name: Matthew 23:2
verses.text: Saying, The scribes and the Pharisees sit in Moses’ seat:

verses.name: Matthew 23:3
verses.text: All therefore whatsoever they bid you observe, that observe and do; but do not ye after their works: for they say, and do not.

verses.name: Matthew 23:4
verses.text: For they bind heavy burdens and grievous to be borne, and lay them on men’s shoulders; but they themselves will not move them with one of their fingers.

verses.name: Matthew 23:5
verses.text: But all their works they do for to be seen of men: they make broad their phylacteries, and enlarge the borders of their garments,
